name: Squirrel Forest
description:
Squirrel Forest

is an indie simulation, strategy game. It can be considered a city builder with a twist.

Scavenging for resources that would help the squirrels build shelters and hide from the weather conditions and looking for food to survive later leads to planting trees and being able to grow your own resources and have shelter from the weather in the forest.

Short Term Goal

Survive and gather as much resources as possible progressing through new discoveries.

Long term goal

Re-plant the whole forest and ensure the survival of the species.
